product_name: Hiking and Biking the I&M Canal National Heritage Corridor
long_description: Features Illinois and Michigan Canal National Heritage Corridor trails in Cook, Du Page, Will Grundy and La Salle Counties in Illinois. Author: American Bike Trails. Softcover; 176 pages; black-and-white photos and maps. American Bike Trails; copyright 2007. Describes the forest preserves, parks and pathways with more than 96 mi. of trails and bike paths. Includes easy-to-read maps, directions to access points, distances, points of interest, sectional overviews and alternate trails.
short_description: Features Illinois and Michigan Canal National Heritage Corridor trails in Cook, Du Page, Will Grundy and La Salle Counties in Illinois.
